reqs:
Pre-reqs: BIOL 121.
Equivalents: BIOL 327
Please visit the course outline here - http://courses.landfood.ubc.ca/apbi327/files/APBI327_Insect_Collections-2-2015.pdf. If you are choosing to do insect collection and not the lab exam for the course, please try to collect as many insects as possible in summer. description: A survey of the structure, classification and biology of insects; ecology and life-histories of insects; insect-plant relations.
